name: Pixel Pursuit (itch)
description:
Get ready for an exciting new game called "Pixel Pursuit"! Are you looking for a fun and challenging game to test your reflexes and strategic thinking? If so, then this game is perfect for you!

 In "Pixel Pursuit", you play as a blue dot that needs to collect green dots while avoiding red dots. The game takes place on a grid, and you must swipe and move around to navigate the grid and collect as many green dots as possible. However, be careful not to touch any red dots, or it's game over!

“Pixel Pursuit" is the perfect game for anyone who enjoys casual puzzle or action games. With its simple yet challenging gameplay, you'll find yourself hooked for hours as you try to beat your high score and collect as many green dots as possible. Plus, with its simple design, you'll love the look and feel of the game.

Play "Pixel Pursuit" today and start swiping and collecting green dots!

I might finish this game. Who knows!
